title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Fastprint's unit to buy Xcerra's semiconductor related assets
text:
BRIEF-Shenzhen Fastprint's unit to buy Xcerra's semiconductor related assets Sept 9 
Sept 9 Shenzhen Fastprint Circuit Tech Co Ltd 
* Says its Hong Kong unit to buy Xcerra's semiconductor test interface board business for $23 million 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1LjtoG6 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom) Trending On Reuters
